code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Articles=()=>{const[articles,setArticles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchArticles=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("https://wowclean-api.vercel.app/api/articles");setArticles(response.data);};fetchArticles();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"articles-page",children:["      ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"articles-grid",children:articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"article-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.image,alt:article.title,className:"article-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"articles-title",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"article-text",children:article.text.length>100?"".concat(article.text.substring(0,100),"..."):article.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/articles/".concat(article.id),className:"read-more-btn",children:"Read More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"article-meta",children:["Published on: ",new Date(article.published_date).toLocaleDateString()]})]},article.id))})]});};export default Articles;
